sentences.en: a city not &B{geared up to} an outdoor lifestyle.
sentences.cn: 一个还没有为户外生活方式做好准备的城市。

sentences.en: a group of investors who had geared up for the takeover fight.
sentences.cn: 已经为兼并做好准备的一群投资人

sentences.en: a nation geared for war.
sentences.cn: 全国已经进入备战状态。

sentences.en: Andy drove cautiously along in third gear.
sentences.cn: 安迪挂着三挡小心地行驶。

sentences.en: Any cyclist can climb a difficult hill; you just change gear.
sentences.cn: 谁都能骑上难爬的山坡，只要换挡就行了。

sentences.en: Bring your rain gear.
sentences.cn: 带上你的雨具。

sentences.en: Careless use of the clutch may damage the gears.
sentences.cn: 离合器使用不慎可能会损坏传动装置。

sentences.en: Colleges are not always geared to the needs of mature students.
sentences.cn: 大学并不总是去适应成年学生的需要。

sentences.en: Does this thing have a reverse gear?
sentences.cn: 这玩意儿有倒挡吗？

sentences.en: Don’t turn off the engine while you’re still in gear.
sentences.cn: 还挂着挡的时候不要关发动机。

sentences.en: He put the truck in gear and drove on.
sentences.cn: 他把卡车挂上挡，继续往前开。

sentences.en: He suggested that tangling fishing gear should be made a criminal offence.
sentences.cn: 他提议，缠绕捕鱼器材应该算刑事犯罪。

sentences.en: He told us when to indicate and when to change gear.
sentences.cn: 他告诉我们何时打转向灯、何时换挡。

sentences.en: He’s crazy about photography – he’s got all the gear.
sentences.cn: 他对摄影很着迷——所有的器材他都有。

sentences.en: His mountain bike had 18 gears.
sentences.cn: 他的山地自行车有18挡。

sentences.en: I did a double-take when I saw her dressed in biker's gear.
sentences.cn: 看见她一身赛车手打扮，我一时没反应过来。

sentences.en: I used to wear trendy gear but it just looked ridiculous.
sentences.cn: 我以前常穿新潮的衣服，但看上去却滑稽可笑。

sentences.en: I've got to get my act in gear.
sentences.cn: 我得采取行动了。

sentences.en: It’s a good habit to take the car out of gear while you’re at a stoplight.
sentences.cn: 等红灯时换空挡的习惯很好。

sentences.en: My training was geared toward winning gold.
sentences.cn: 我的训练是为赢得金牌去规划的。

sentences.en: police in riot gear
sentences.cn: 穿着防暴服的警察

sentences.en: Police in riot gear baton-charged the crowd.
sentences.cn: 暴乱中，警察挥舞着警棍对人群发起冲击。

sentences.en: Police with riot gear and several fire engines are in attendance.
sentences.cn: 防暴警察和数辆消防车都到了。

sentences.en: Ranks of police in riot gear stood nervously by.
sentences.cn: 一队队防暴警察紧张待命。

sentences.en: She selected a low gear and started down the track carefully.
sentences.cn: 她选了低速挡小心翼翼地沿小径下行。

sentences.en: she took the engine out of gear.
sentences.cn: 她将引擎停下。

sentences.en: sometimes his brain seems to slip out of gear.
sentences.cn: 有时候，他的脑袋好像不听使唤了。

sentences.en: the captain revved the engines and put them in gear.
sentences.cn: 机长加快发动机转速，使其进入工作状态。

sentences.en: The car was in fourth gear.
sentences.cn: 车挂的是四挡。

sentences.en: The driver tried to change gear, then swerved.
sentences.cn: 司机试图换挡，接着突然转向。

sentences.en: The typical career pattern was geared to men whose wives didn’t work.
sentences.cn: 这种典型的职业模式是为妻子不工作的男性设计的。

sentences.en: They helped us put our gear back into the van.
sentences.cn: 他们帮我们把装备放回到小货车里。

sentences.en: They were sensibly dressed from top to toe in rain gear.
sentences.cn: 他们从头到脚都用雨具捂得严严实实，非常明智。

sentences.en: This large gear turns the small one to rotate the cylinder.
sentences.cn: 这个大齿轮带动小齿轮使滚筒旋转。

sentences.en: We made a tour of the yacht, checking lashings and emergency gear.
sentences.cn: 我们在那艘游艇上四处看了看，检查了它的系索和应急装置。

sentences.en: We’ll need some camping gear.
sentences.cn: 我们需要带些宿营设备。

sentences.en: When she put the car in gear it began to buck wildly.
sentences.cn: 当她把汽车搭上齿轮时，汽车便开始颠簸地行进。

sentences.en: When the clutch broke, the car was locked into second gear.
sentences.cn: 离合器失灵后，汽车只能在二挡行驶。

words.tran_cn: 以齿轮连起；配搭活动（gear的ing形式）
适合；搭上齿轮；开始工作

phrases.tran_cn: 锥齿轮，锥形齿轮；伞齿轮
减速器；齿轮减速箱；齿轮减速装置
（为适应某人或某事）对（某物）进行调整（或改造）
为…准备好：为一将要发生的行动或事件做好准备
起落架；起落装置，着陆装置
弧齿锥齿轮；螺旋伞齿轮
转向机构；转向装置；轮向齿轮

trans.tran_cn: 齿轮，排挡，传动装置，设备，衣服 ，毒品
trans.tran_en: a set of clothes that you wear for a particular occasion or activity
to be organized in a way that is suitable for a particular purpose or situation
If someone or something is geared to or toward a particular purpose, they are organized or designed in order to achieve that purpose
